      • addMembersToGroup

        public void addMembersToGroup(Context context,
                     CNConversation conversation,
                     java.util.ArrayList<CNContact> members,
                     AddMembersToGroupCallback callback)
        Add members to the group.
        Parameters:
        context - Calling context. Can be an application context.
        conversation - A group CNConversation object.
        members - A list of members to be added to the group.
        callback - Listener to receive results of the call.

      • changeGroupOwner

        public void changeGroupOwner(Context context,
                    CNConversation conversation,
                    CNContact owner,
                    ChangeGroupOwnerCallback callback)
        Change the owner of the group.
        Parameters:
        context - Calling context. Can be an application context.
        conversation - A group CNConversation object.
        owner - The new owner of the group.
        callback - Listener to receive results of the call.

      • createGroup

        public void createGroup(Context context,
               java.lang.String groupName,
               java.util.ArrayList<CNContact> members,
               CreateConversationCallback callback)
        Create a group CNConversation.
        Parameters:
        context - Calling context. Can be an application context.
        groupName - Name of the group.
        members - List of account names who will be a part of the group.
        callback - Listener to receive results of the call.

      • editGroupName

        public void editGroupName(Context context,
                 CNConversation conversation,
                 java.lang.String groupName,
                 EditGroupNameCallback callback)
        Change the name of the group.
        Parameters:
        context - Calling context. Can be an application context.
        conversation - A group CNConversation object.
        groupName - The new name of the group.
        callback - Listener to receive results of the call.

      • removeMembersFromGroup

        public void removeMembersFromGroup(Context context,
                          CNConversation conversation,
                          java.util.ArrayList<CNContact> members,
                          RemoveMembersFromGroupCallback callback)
        Remove members from the group. Can also be used to remove the current user from the group, unless that user is the Owner. If they are the owner, they must first change the owner of the group.
        Parameters:
        context - Calling context. Can be an application context.
        conversation - A group CNConversation object.
        members - A list of members to be removed from the group.
        callback - Listener to receive results of the call.
